review: This is a great invention. If you are planning on using this at home, it could easily replace your cable with Netflix. My only warning is that if you plan on using this at a hotel or a college or any other place where you have to have a username and password to access wifi, it will not work. If you are using a home wifi, even if it is password protected, it will work wonders for you.

review: I've owned my Chromecast for about a year now and I really love it. Its not fun having to plug and un-plug video games and DVD players in but this was really easy to use. I had it set up within a few minutes and even after changing my wifi password, I had my Chromecast synced back up in a few more minutes.Why I give this 4 starts instead of 5 is because it doesn't play Amazon Prime video, which is a shame. I'd be willing to change my rating from 4 to 5 stars if thats Amazon's fault.
